comment: Very nice teacher who truly cares for his students. Thought I wasn't gonna pass the class but I talked to him and he helped me and encouraged me I could pass. Talk to him and show up to class he will help you. Now about to take him for data science

Very chill professor. Even though attendance is mandatory, it's ok if you are running behind a few times. All hw is through Aleks, and quizzes are online through D2L and you're able to tab out and use notes if needed. There are 3 tests that are on paper, but you get to use a "cheat sheet" and then are able to do test corrections after. Take him!

honestly one of my favorite teachers here!! he's very kind and you can tell he cares for his students and wants everyone to succeed. hw on aleks which are not too difficult but it helps you prepare for the exams and the hw quizzes (not lockdown/webcam). exam are in person and not hard unless you study! take him if u care abt your mental health lol

Hes nice and a good teacher. tries to keep students engaged. uses aleks for homework and has quizzes almost weekly but not a lot. Definitely attend class because you will miss a lot and not know what you're doing. He allows a cheat sheet for every test. Easy class and good teacher!

Nice but not my favorite. He wasn't the best at teaching. I would say to take his class for an easy prof and assignments, and go to the smart lab and ask them to teach you (ask for Gabriel). Rather than go to his classes that's what I would do. Quizzes are online with a webcam but open notes. Tests in person with a note card. ALEKS hw.
The course itself was pretty easy, and Watson is an easy grader. Every assignment comes with step-by-step video instructions on what to do and the quizzes are short and to the point.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Online Savvy

comment: TAKE HIS CLASS! Super chill guy, really passionate about getting his students to learn the info, he literally explains even the tiny details. ALEKS HW for every unit, takes an hr or 2. Quizzes webcam online, test irl. I've never been good at math but I am coasting through this class and It's thanks to him. Not a heavy course, just listen to him.

Honestly just a great guy. Super chill, not a lot of workload. Tests are in person but quizzes and homework are online. He lectures very easily, and everything is easy to understand. Honestly, if you actually try and just do the work, there's no reason you shouldn't get an A in his class. 10/10 reccomend this guy.

Professor Watson was super caring and very understanding of personal situations. He communicates well and can be easily reached through email. The course work itself is a lot but he gives a week to complete it. Just come to class and keep up with your work cause it can get difficult to keep up with at the end.
